thread.title: Super Bowl 2017: Watch Hamilton ’s Schuyler Sisters Perform “America the Beautiful”
thread.title_full: Super Bowl 2017: Watch Hamilton ’s Schuyler Sisters Perform “America the Beautiful”

author: Noah Yoo
title: Super Bowl 2017: Watch Hamilton ’s Schuyler Sisters Perform “America the Beautiful”

persons.name: lin-manuel miranda walter mcbride/getty images  phillipa soo

text:
Super Bowl 2017: Watch Hamilton ’s Schuyler Sisters Perform “America the Beautiful” Phillipa Soo, Renée Elise Goldsberry, and Jasmine Cephas Jones shout out “sisterhood” Lin-Manuel Miranda Walter McBride/Getty Images 
Phillipa Soo, Renée Elise Goldsberry and Jasmine Cephas Jones performed “America the Beautiful” at Super Bowl LI in Houston. During the bit where they sang, “And crown thy good with brotherhood,” they also sang “sisterhood.” The three actors, who gained popularity in their roles as the Schuyler sisters in Lin-Manuel Miranda’s original Broadway run of Hamilton , reprised their parts for the performance. Watch it happen below. #SB51 : Watch the cast of 'Hamilton' sing "America the Beautiful" at the Super Bowl. pic.twitter.com/fLPljYBe2z — Hollywood Reporter (@THR) February 5, 2017 Artists In This Story
